> Tucson knew deep down that Vestige was a part of Rodimus and=
 that by relighting his spark, would hopefully rekindle the spark in Rodimu=
s as well. The exchange of energy was mysteriously not taxing on Tucson as =
it would have been if he had transfered his own spark energy into his chest=
. This was a power that was saved for many years in the hopes that one day,=
 it's energy would be needed for a greater purpose. This was that day. And =
as Vestige came alive, his heart felt all the more energized as it filled e=
ndlessly with the joy of hope he had for his new friend.
>
> " I hope never=
 to lose you my friend, you've helped me in more ways than I can describe. =
You've given me new found hope that adversity can be overcome, and now I pa=
ss on that power of hope to you. We can do this, we will awaken Rodimus and=
 through our compassion for each other, we may just be able to exterminate =
this enemy for good."

<NEW>

Vesitige nodded, for once his movements were =
not the movements of an
old machine but one that was new and vibrant, as if=
 he stepped off the
assembly line. Vestige slid out of Tuscon's cab and sto=
od beside him,
his body seemingly larger and more imposing. He turned to lo=
ok at
Tuscon, a familiar rougish look on his features, similar to one that
=
Rodimus may have worn at different times. "Yes it is time." His voice
grim =
and determined.

With a deft movement and while being careful to keep his a=
ttacks away
from the figure on the table, he laid down some cover fire betw=
een he
and the approaching insectoid alien creatures to give Tuscon time to=

transform or to do whatever thought he had in mind.

Meanwhile the figure =
on the table continued to stir, it was as if it
was fighting something. It =
was only then that it became obvious that
it was being held down by straps =
or tendrils. The figure's movements
were steadily getting weaker as it atte=
mpted to fight its way out.

As all this was happening a persistant buzzing=
 and even a rumbling
could be heard in the background. It would seem that t=
he attacks had
been noticed and something was comming!
